price: 6. In order that you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are heedless.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
